name: cypress-tests
description: Contains end-to-end tests for the packages.

scripts.test:kpi: TZ=Etc/UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --config-file config/kpi-widget.config.ts
scripts.test:release: TZ=Etc/UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --config-file config/release-notes.config.ts
scripts.test:reminder: TZ=Etc/UTC npx cypress run --browser chrome --config-file config/reminder.config.ts

author: UI Guild, @hnaether-c8y
